entity.query: UPDATE IMTD_DEDUCTION_DETAILS SET CHECK_RECORD = ? WHERE USERS_SID = ? AND SESSION_ID = ?

select HIERARCHY_DEFINITION_SID,VERSION_NO
from dbo.HIERARCHY_LEVEL_DEFINITION Group by HIERARCHY_DEFINITION_SID,VERSION_NO ORDER BY HIERARCHY_DEFINITION_SID OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY;
